title: Profile: Pier Luigi Bersani - BBC News
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani, the leader of Italy's centre-left bloc, is a former Communist with a track record in government as an economic liberal.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani - Wikipedia
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (Italian pronunciation: [ˈpjɛr luˈiːdʒi berˈsaːni]; born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician and was Secretary of the Democratic Party (PD), Italy's leading centre-left party, from 2009 to 2013. Bersani was Minister of Industry, Commerce and Craftmanship from ...

title: Italy vote: Pier Luigi Bersani wins centre-left poll - BBC News
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani has won the race to be the centre-left candidate for Italian PM in next year's general election, according to partial results.
